name: Dating Shrek
description: Dating Shrek is a game inspired by my friend. And when I was making this game I got bored midway. In this game all you do is date with shrek and since I am super lazy I didn't make any gui all of it is default. and code is less than 100 lines lol. In this game you talk with shrek. Definitely didn't steal anything from Monika After Story. Now dive into immersive world  dating shrek.
